name: Ball Dropper
description:
Ball Dropper is a game where your scope is to survive on the platforms and collect as many stars as you can.

This game is a submission made for the MashUP Game Jam with the theme: SIZE MATTERS!

Hope you enjoy playing it!

Controls:

A/D - movement sideways

W/S - increase/decrease size

R - start/restart

Tools used:

Game Engine - Unity

Art - Aseprite

SFX - sfxr

Music - Bosca Ceoil

Warning!  The creator is not good at composing music, thus suggesting that you play with music off.
